title: FIGHTING THE EMPIRE - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Gameplay
description:
Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Gameplay - Welcome Back to Medieval Kingdoms Total War!  In this battle I command Kievan Rus and my ally is commanding Hungary.  We are taking on two armies from the Holy Roman Empire.  Enjoy the Video :D

Mod Link: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=770918746&searchtext=

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
